pkgmetadata.longdescription: High-Dimensional Covariate-Augmented Overdispersed Poisson Factor Model // A covariate-augmented overdispersed Poisson factor model is proposed to jointly perform a high-dimensional Poisson factor analysis and estimate a large coefficient matrix for overdispersed count data. More details can be referred to Liu et al. (2024) doi:10.1093/biomtc/ujae031.
